name: MAXIMUM OVERDRIVE (itch)
description:
This is not one of my best creations, but I think it'll do. I never thought I was gonna make a game based of a meme, but it turns out I did. The object is to get your tetty fish back from MAXIMUM OVERDRIVE while he's napping.

Controls: D (foward) A (backward) Space bar (jump) S (down)

But you have to be careful because there are objects scaddered all over the floor of MAXIMUM OVERDRIVE's room. (He's not a clean person) So hope you guys enjoy this game!
